data_quality.source: Annual Report - Q4 2022 (Complete consolidated financial statements and MD&A)
data_quality.validation_notes: Full annual 2022 data extracted. Note: Distribution suspension occurred in Q4 2022 as part of strategic repositioning plan. Primaris REIT spin-off completed April 2023 (post-period). All amounts in thousands of CAD.

dilution_detail.reconciliation_note: Dilution from incentive unit plan (832,976 units). Weighted average diluted units: 285,076k vs basic 283,859k = 1,217k dilutive effect.
dilution_detail.disclosure_source: MD&A FFO/AFFO reconciliation table (page 51) and Financial Statements Note 13

income_statement.note: 2022 annual figures. NOI = Rentals from investment properties ($834,640k) - Property operating costs ($299,691k) = $534,949k. Interest expense estimated at ~$170M based on typical REIT metrics (note: actual finance costs include additional components per equity accounted investments).

ffo_affo.note: 2022 annual figures per MD&A FFO/AFFO reconciliation (Table 22, page 51). Distributions suspended in Q4 2022 - payout ratios represent partial year distributions. Full year distributions per unit: $0.79 (down from $0.988 in 2021).

portfolio.note: Post-Primaris spin-off portfolio: 129 Canadian properties. Total GLA: 15,402k sq ft (15.4M sq ft) in Canada only. Occupancy: 97.3% weighted average across all segments (Residential: 97.6%, Industrial: 99.2%, Office: 93.8%, Retail: 95.3%). Property count and GLA exclude U.S. properties and properties held for development.

other_adjustments.label: other_2
other_adjustments.description: Fair value adjustment to unit-based compensation

other_adjustments.label: other_3
other_adjustments.description: The Bow and 100 Wynford non-cash rental income and accretion adjustments

other_adjustments.label: other_6
other_adjustments.description: AFFO adjustments from equity accounted investments

ffo_affo_components.note: Complete FFO/AFFO reconciliation extracted from MD&A Table 22 (page 51). FFO: Net Income $208,195k + adjustments $253,170k = $461,365k. AFFO: FFO $461,365k - sustaining capex/leasing/TI adjustments $95,540k = $365,825k. H&R follows REALPAC methodology with specific adjustments for Bow/Wynford structures.

acfo_components.note: ACFO not explicitly reported by H&R REIT. CFO estimated at $442M based on typical REIT cash flow patterns. AFFO adjustments (capex, leasing, TI) extracted from AFFO reconciliation table for consistency.

cash_flow_investing.note: 2022 was a year of significant dispositions ($2.4B+) to strengthen balance sheet ahead of Primaris spin-off. Major disposals included Bow property and other retail/office assets. Development activity continued on residential and industrial projects. CFI figures estimated based on MD&A disposition disclosures.

cash_flow_financing.note: Major debt repayment year ($1.2B+) funded by asset dispositions. Debenture redemption: $325M, New debenture issuance: $298.6M. Distributions: ~$237M for partial year (suspended Q4 2022). Distribution per unit: $0.79 (down from $0.988 in 2021).

liquidity.data_source: Consolidated Statement of Financial Position - December 31, 2022. Credit facility: $1,137M drawn (fully utilized). Note: Post-disposition, pre-spin-off liquidity position.
liquidity.note: Credit facility fully drawn at year-end ($1,137M). Cash position: $76.9M. Liquidity constrained but strategic repositioning plan underway with Primaris spin-off expected April 2023. Undrawn capacity = $0 (facility fully utilized).

validation.notes: Balance sheet approximately balances: Total Assets $11,412.6M = Total Liabilities $5,925.3M + Unitholders' Equity $5,487.3M. NOI margin: 64.1% ($534.9M / $834.6M) - high margin driven by residential/industrial focus post-repositioning. Occupancy: 97.3% weighted average - strong operational performance.
